problem: My external monitor is not working.
solutions: 1. Check to make sure the power cable is plugged in to the outlet.
2. Check to make sure all the connections from outlet to monitor are tight.
3. Is the power on? Press the power button and see if the monitor will turn on.
4. If the above steps do not work, try restarting the computer.
5. If all else fails, please contact IT with the link below.

problem: I can't access the server. My password doesn't work.
solution: 1. Is there a period '.' between your first name and last name?
2. Have you recently reset the password?
3. Are you connected to the correct WiFi? It won't work if you're on the 1 80 Guest WiFi.
4. If all else fails, please contact IT with the link below.
1. Are you connected to the correct WiFi? It won't work if you're on the 1 80 Guest WiFi.
2. Are you releasing the job at the printer? At the printer, hit the 'job status' button, select your name, and select 'release all'.
3. Pause the job. Turn off Wifi then back on again. Resume the job.
4. if all else fails, please contact IT with the link below.
